Package bn.base

package bn.base
Base implementations of the core data structures for Bayesian Networks.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Assignment
    Base implementation of an Assignment as an ArrayMap from RandomVariables to Values.
    BayesianNetwork
    Base implementation of a BayesianNetwork as a graph of Nodes each of which corresponds to a RandomVariable with a CPT.
    BooleanDomain
    A BooleanDomain is a Domain containing the two BooleanValues TRUE and FALSE.
    BooleanValue
    A BooleanValue is a Boolean that can be used as a Value.
    BooleanVariable
    BooleanVariables all shared a single instance of a BooleanDomain.
    CPT
    Base implementation of a conditional probability table (CPT) as a Map from Assignments to Distributions.
    Distribution
    Base implementation of a Distribution as an ArrayMap from Values to Doubles.
    Domain
    Base implementation of a Domain as an ArraySet of Values.
    NamedVariable
    Base implementation of a RandomVariable that has a name as well as its Domain of Values.
    StringValue
    A StringValue is a String that can be used as a Value.
    Value<T>
    Base implementation of Values allows you to wrap any other type and make instance of that type into Values.
